block.p: Dr. Lynn Sermin Meskill and Mirabeau Buonaparte Lamar Higgins are to be married today in the Princes Islands in Turkey. Aynur Alyanak, a civil marriage celebrant, will officiate at the Ocean Club in Buyukada.
The bride is a copywriter at WordSmith, an Istanbul advertising agency, which the bridegroom founded and owns.

Dr. Lynn Sermin Meskill and Mirabeau Buonaparte Lamar Higgins are to be married today in the Princes Islands in Turkey. Aynur Alyanak, a civil marriage celebrant, will officiate at the Ocean Club in Buyukada.
The bride is a copywriter at WordSmith, an Istanbul advertising agency, which the bridegroom founded and owns.

Dr. Meskill, 38, who is known as Sermin, is keeping her name. She graduated from Princeton and received a master's degree and a Ph.D. in English literature from the University of Virginia. She is the daughter of Serin S. Oget of Istanbul and Dr. Robert H. Meskill of Anna Maria, Fla. Her father retired as a professor of linguistics at Brown in Providence, R.I. Her mother is a psychotherapist in Istanbul.

The bridegroom, 30, is known as Beau. He graduated from the University of Maryland. He is a son of Dr. Eva P. Higgins and Dr. Robert Higgins of Baltimore. His mother is a sales associate at Hill & Company, a real estate agency in Baltimore. His father retired as the president of Southeastern University in Washington.
